attributes.action: Sack Theresa May for Gross Misconduct of Duties
attributes.background: Theresa May was given the job as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom to take us out of the EU. This she has not done in fact she has been the biggest hindrance to the task, I therefore say that in line with all other employment she needs to be removed.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that call for people to lose their jobs.
